channel.name: URGENCY_APPOINTMENT_FUNC_PROCESS_IN

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Set destinations

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptrule.name: Create Default Response
Filter if MessageHeader Event is AppointmentCreated

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Decode Message - AppointmentCreated

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptrule.name: Validate eventType
Filter mandatory fields
Validate Location Health Center
Validate ServiceCategory
Validate specialty
Validate serviceType

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Decode Message - VisitCheckInEnded

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptrule.name: Validate if eventType equals "VisitCheckInEnded"
Validate agendamentoIntRefExt Exists
Validate senha if "Exists"

codeTemplateLibrary.name: ACK Functions
codeTemplateLibrary.description: ACK build messages Library

codeTemplateLibrary.name: API Functions
codeTemplateLibrary.description: API functions library with utility functions for generic functions that will be invoked along the various channels, e.g. consumption of basic PatientCare services, logging of logs, etc

codeTemplate.name: Web Service Rest API Consumption - genericApiCall

codeTemplateLibrary.name: DateUtils
codeTemplateLibrary.description: Date Utilities for formating Dates and convert formats, Date Processing

codeTemplateLibrary.name: FHIR DB Operations
codeTemplateLibrary.description: Functions used by the FHIR Listener channel to communicate with the database. PostgreSQL and SQL Server are supported. If you want to support other database servers, feel free to add your own database-specific operations and queries.

codeTemplate.name: FHIR DB - Execute Cached Query and Get Keys

codeTemplateLibrary.name: FHIR Helper Functions
codeTemplateLibrary.description:
General functions to help convert HL7 v2.x to FHIR resources.
These are used by the example HL7 to FHIR transformer, as well as the "HL7 v2.x to FHIR Creation Functions" code template library.

codeTemplateLibrary.name: Logger Functions
codeTemplateLibrary.description: Funções auxiliares para o logging de mensagens dos canais

codeTemplateLibrary.description: Mapeamentos de dados de varios sistemas externos

codeTemplateLibrary.name: RabbitMQ Helper Function
codeTemplateLibrary.description: Functions defined in order to assist reading and writing into a RabbitMQ queue

codeTemplateLibrary.name: Utils
codeTemplateLibrary.description: Utils functions for Mirth Channels

channel.name: URGENCY_WORKFLOW_OUT
channel.description:
Descrição: Canal responsável pelo workflow do serviço de urgencia.
Documentação: https://b-simple.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IE/pages/195133441/Atendimento%2BPermanente%2B-%2BChamada%2Bdo%2Bdoente
Versão: 1.0.0
Dependências: - basicProducerV6.jar
Canais interligados: - URGENCY_FUNC_CALL_PATIENT
Variáveis de ambiente: - RabbitMqHost - RabbitMqPort - RabbitMqUsername - RabbitMqPassword - RabbitMqExchange_UrgenciaChamadaDoente
ChangeLog:
1.0.0 - Primeiro versionamento

channel.name: URGENCY_UPDATE_LOCATION_OUT
channel.description:
Descrição: Canal responsável por receber de Patient Care as alterações de localização de urgência e comunicá-las para sistema externo. No caso de a localização anterior ser um serviço de observações, vai despoletar um evento de criação de charge item para ocanal correspondente
Documentação: https://b-simple.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IE/pages/210894849/Atendimento+Permanente+Comunica+o+de+altera+o+de+lozaliza+o+do+doente https://b-simple.atlassian.net/wiki/x/BYBXEQ
Versão: 2.0.0 ChangeLog: 1.0.0 - versão inicial com a construção e comunicação do ChargeItem intracanal. 2.0.0 - reestruturação do canal para centralizar a lógica de construção do ChargeItem no canal FUNC_CREATE_CHARGE_ITEM
Dependências: - readQueueRMQ() - queueDeclareRMQ() - generateLogMsg() - DateUtc() - getIdentificador() - httpGet() - isJSON() - httpPost()
Canais interligados: - FUNC_CREATE_CHARGE_ITEM
Variáveis de ambiente: - RabbitMqHost - RabbitMqPort - RabbitMqUsername - RabbitMqPassword - RabbitMqVirtualHost - RabbitMqExchange_UrgenciaLocalizacaoDoente - FhirServer_IMTHOM_Host

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: visita
com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.script:
var mappingVisita = getIdentificador(msg['episodioIdentificadores'], "encounter.id");
channelMap.put('visita', validate(mappingVisita, '', new Array()));

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Set destinations
GetLocationUUID
Adaptar p/ FUNC_CREATE_CHARGE_ITEM
Custom metadata
